name: An Evening With Warren Worthington Multiple Choice Quiz | Entertainment | 10 Questions

questions.text: Which British mutant was Worthington romantically involved with?
questions.explanation:
Psylocke.

	Psylocke is really Betsy Braddock, a psychic mutant whose brother Brian is Captain Britain. Worthington has also been romantically linked to the younger Paige Guthrie.

questions.text: Worthington underwent a secondary mutation; he can heal people with his blood! What requirement must be met first?
questions.correct: They must share the same bloodtype
options: He can only heal people near death
He must lose two quarts of blood before he can heal someone.
questions.explanation:
They must share the same bloodtype.

	Worthington learned of this mutation when he saved Paige Guthrie, also known as Husk, from near-fatal injuries. This secondary power is fickle; sometimes it can revive people who have just died and sometimes it cannot heal large injuries.

questions.text: Dark Beast turned Worthington's skin blue.
questions.explanation:
False.

	Apocalypse turned Worthington's skin blue, and he also replaced Worthington's wings with metal ones. As Apocalypse's henchman Death, Worthington fought his former allies, the X-Men.

questions.text: During the Morlock Massacre, which two villains pinned Worthington to a wall by his wings?
questions.explanation:
Harpoon and Blockbuster.

	Gravely injured, Worthington's wings are amputated because gangrene had set in. Depressed beyond words, Worthington was going to kill himself in his private jet, but was whisked away by Apocalypse in the nick of time.

questions.text: In the Age of Apocalypse timeline, Worthington operated a bar in Manhattan. What was it called?
questions.explanation:
Heaven.

	Worthington kept cutting deals with Magneto, Apocalypse and the Human High Council to keep himself and his patrons relatively safe. He later joined Magneto's forces and sacrificed his life so that the X-Men could bypass Apocalypse's defenses.

questions.text: Which superhero came across a severely beaten Worthington in the Morlock sewers and carried him to safety?
questions.explanation:
Thor.

	Thor and Daredevil were two of the non-mutant characters involved in the Morlock Massacre, but it was Thor that happened across a crucified Angel and carried him to safety.

questions.text: Worthington fought for Apocalypse as the Horseman War until he was tricked into believing that he had killed Cyclops.
questions.explanation:
False.

	It was Bobby Drake, Iceman, that played possum in order to get Worthington to come to his senses. Turning against Apocalypse, Worthington helped the X-Men beat the immortal tyrant.

questions.text: Worthington's skin returned to a normal color when the X-Men fought Black Tom Cassidy.
questions.explanation:
True.

	Tom Cassidy is the evil relative of the X-Man Banshee, Sean Cassidy. Black Tom is commonly paired with the Juggernaut, a superstrong villain who has also worked with the X-Men.

questions.text: Worthington discovered that some of the money from Worthington Industries was going towards a mutant brothel. Which mutant was the only survivor of this establishment?
questions.explanation:
Stacy X.

	Stacy X is a mutant who has the power to control pheromones. While with the X-Men she tried to seduce both Worthington and Kurt Wagner, also known as Nightcrawler.

questions.text: After defeating the mutant island Krakoa, Worthington left the X-Men. Where did he go?
questions.explanation:
Los Angeles.

	Worthington went to Los Angeles along with his teammate Iceman to form the short-lived superhero team The Champions. He returned to the X-Men some time later, after both Jean Grey and Cyclops became unavailable.
